import React from 'react'; import './OrderConfirmation.css'; const OrderConfirmation = ({ orderNumber, cart, total, onNewOrder, onPhoneOrder }) => { return (
âœ…

Order Placed!

Order Number

{orderNumber}

Your Order:

{cart.map(item => (
{item.image}
{item.name} Qty: {item.quantity}
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}

Total: ${total}

Your order has been created! Click the button above to send it via phone.

); }; export default OrderConfirmation;
